_commentedProducts.name: Custom Photo Lithophane
_commentedProducts.description: Transform your favorite photos into stunning 3D printed lithophanes. These unique art pieces reveal beautiful images when backlit, creating a magical display perfect for home decor or as a personalized gift.

products.name: Lithophane Keyring
products.description: Carry your memories everywhere! Compact lithophane keyring featuring your favorite photo. A perfect personalized accessory or gift that you can take with you wherever you go.

products.name: Valentine's Teddy Bear
products.description: Adorable 3D printed teddy bear holding a red heart, perfect for Valentine's Day or as a thoughtful gift for someone special. This cute companion features detailed texture and a charming design that captures the spirit of love and affection.

materialOptions.name: PLA
